description: Water Development Commission is looking to hire qualified applicants who fulfill the following requirements
education: First Degree in Purchasing and Management, Management, Accounting
howToApply: Qualified applicants who fulfill the above requirements should submit all their necessary credentials such as Educational Background, Work Experince(include details such as employment details, start and end date as well as previous salary), CV along with an unreturnable photocopy to the following address: Haile Gebresilase Street, next to Capital Hotel, inside the Ministry of Water, Irrigation and Energy campus, 1st-floor Human Resource Management Office number 23 Addis Ababa.

description: Horti-LIFE II is a 3 years project (2019-2022) funded by the Embassy of the Kingdom of the Netherlands (EKN), implemented by SNV-Ethiopia in cooperation with the Ministry of Agriculture and Natural Resources. The program aims to increase export and food and nutritional security levels by supporting smallholder farmers in the horticulture sector.
education: A relevant MSc degree (or equivalent like a BSc with a lot of experience). This means MBA /Administration / Finance
yearsOfExperience: A minimum of 10 years of work experience in administration.
howToApply: Please send your application letter and CV that contains three referees as you apply with the position title as subject/reference. NB: Only shortlisted will be contacted. Women are encouraged to apply Additional Information Terms of Appointment This is a full-time position with the successful candidate being contracted on a 2 years contract with the possibility of renewal. Salary is competitive and commensurate with qualifications and experience with an attractive benefits package. SNV is a global organization committed to bringing different people, ideas, and perspectives together. We invite especially women to submit their application as we want to increase the number of women in leadership positions.

description: The Bank would like to invite competent and qualified candidates to apply for the following positions to be hired on a permanent basis.
education: BA in Accounting, Accounting & Finance, Banking & Insurance, Marketing, Business Administration, Management or other related fields
yearsOfExperience: 1.5 years of experience or Diploma (Level 4) in the same fields with 3 years of experience in banking operation, customer service operation in the banking industry
placeOfWork: Wolkite, Butajira, Chagni & Addis ababa, Ethiopia
howToApply: Interested applicants fulfilling the above requirements are invited to submit their applications and CVs with photocopies of non-returnable supporting credentials up to April 23, 2021 in person at Enat Bank S.C, Head Office around Kazanchis in front of Previous Yordanos Hotel, Enat Tower 6th floor or through 18401 postal address of the Bank Enat Bank P.O.Box: 18401 Only shortlisted candidates will be communicated Women applicants are highly encouraged. The Bank has the right to cancel the post advertised
